title: JavaScript and C# Software Developer III
summary: Application development and maintenance for a Pentagon budgeting application (required Secret clearance).
responsibilities: Migrated UI from Oracle Forms to a hybrid ASP.NET WebForms/MVC + JavaScript single-page approach; integrated with Oracle backend via PL/SQL; improved performance from ~10–15s responses to near-instant for most actions.

Performance tuning: optimized a Word document generation system (addressed multi-threading issues, races, deadlocks); implemented Parallel Task Library and WCF patterns to reduce runtimes to ~3–5 minutes despite ~50× workload.

DevOps/build: refactored legacy code and implemented automated unit/integration tests; participated in releases via TFS; supported multiple maintenance releases to production and iterative releases to test as part of CI.
